titleStmt.title: A proclamation, amongst other the advantages of these our kingdoms, the staple commodities of wooll and cloth are peculiar thereunto James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King, a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Windsor the twelfth day of August, 1688.
